overview: Patrick Miceli occupied several tech positions in the internet industry, he first integrated Kelkoo in 2000, as engineering manager of the European shopping comparison engine. Kelkoo was bought by Yahoo in 2005, he was then based in London were he was Engineering director for Social Media and Search for Yahoo Europe. Patrick then took in 2007 the worldwide position of Engineering Director for Yahoo Answers, managing more than 200 Millions of Unique Users. He integrated Bestofmedia in 2009 as Chief Technology Officer, he’s in charge of product, audience and technical organisation, and created an R&D Center in the south of france in 2010. Patrick Co-founded Drimki.com in 2008, a property marketplace.
